Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute at 26th/Pulaski
ShortDescription: 60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via 26th, Pulaski, 31st, California, and 26th due to, street blockage near 26th/Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 26th, Pulaski, 31st, California, and 26th due to, street blockage near 26th/Pulaski.

Allow extra travel time.
